generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide asphalt road with white lane markings, including a bicycle lane, under an overpass.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and some poles.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background, including a large classical-style building and modern structures.
- fence: A fence is visible in the background, separating the road from a pedestrian area or construction zone.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible on the left side of the image.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign with a red border and a white background is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background, both on the left and right sides of the image.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible in the background, behind the fence.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings in the background.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible parked or driving on the road.
- bus: A bus is visible in the background, parked or driving on the road.
- train: A train is visible in the background, parked or driving on the road.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible being ridden by a person in the middle of the road.
